Size is mentioned in the description you should be able to use the stretch feature in windows to adjust to your monitor size of not just use resizing software works great on my big screen and 20" lcd monitor both 2000+

I don't know why but i guess the delete torrent button isn't working, this one should be deleted don't download.  You can download the solo image or a pack with (Same Image) different sizes if you need a different size. Just click on my name above next to the By: section.
